description:
Brand new to programming and want to get some hands-on Python
experience? Let's learn some Python together!

During this tutorial we will work through a number of programming
exercises together. We'll be doing a lot of asking questions, taking
guesses, trying things out, and seeking out help from others.

In this tutorial we'll cover:

-  Types of things in Python: strings, numbers, lists
-  Conditionally executing code
-  Repeating code with loops
-  Getting user input
title: Hands-On Intro to Python for New Programmers
